original_text: Then thus came every maiden unto the king; whatsoever she desired was given her to go with her out of the house of the women unto the king's house.
korean_text: 처녀가 왕에게 나아갈 때에는 그가 구하는 것을 다 주어 후궁에서 왕궁으로 가지고 가게 하고

sentences.original_text: Then thus came every maiden unto the king
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 모든 처녀가 왕에게 이와 같이 나아갔다

sentences.original_text: whatsoever she desired was given her
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀가 원하는 것은 모두 그녀에게 주어졌다

sentences.original_text: out of the house of the women
